entry.title: U.N. Nuclear Agency Pushes for Safety Zone Around Ukraine's Largest Nuclear Plant
entry.content: IAEA head Rafael Grossi visited Kyiv as a part of his efforts to establish a safety zone around the Zaporizhzhia plant, and Russian missiles struck the nearby city of Zaporizhzhia, killing one.

entry.title: Egypt Released Hundreds of Political Prisoners This Year; Some Say They Were Tortured
entry.content: President Abdel Fattah Al Sisi released the political prisoners ahead of the COP27 climate conference of world leaders in Sharm El Sheikh next month.
